description: The docs describe --novncproxy_base_url as a novncproxy flag.  In reality, it is a nova-compute flag.
title: --novncproxy_base_url is misdocumented

comments.content: The docs describe --novncproxy_base_url as a novncproxy flag.  In reality, it is a nova-compute flag.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sleepsonthefloor
